comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Hmm...you're telling me you wouldn't have just run up and over the other side. You're getting nostalgically lazy, my friend.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: _If_ you can get across the creek, the Red Lion is having a great deal on red snapper tonight. _Kowalski, party of two, your ferry is ready._ I lived behind the Lion for three years and prayed for that stupid bridge to cave so I wouldn't have to go to work. Thirty-five years too late. Bah. DU
